outputs.output_descr:
This project aims to build a production base of biomass fuels in cooperation between leading energy enterprises and local governments which will act as a demonstration base for for the planned expansion biomass fuel industry. The production base, which use shiny-leaved yellowhorn as its base feed-stock, will also rely on solar and wind power for electricity generation for the processing facilities and will pilot irrigating techniques reducing water usage in the plantation management.
This national execution project, which will be implemented in the desert rim of Tarim Basin in Xinjiang, is a joint cooperation between the China International Center for Economic and Technical Exchanges of Ministry of Commerce (CICETE), UNDP, Xinjiang Poverty Alleviation Office, Zhonghuanyou Forestry Development Co. Ltd.

project_descr: Demonstration Project for Biomass Energy Development at the Desert Edge of Tarim Basin
project_title: Demo Project for Biomass Energy Development in XJ
